title: Loving Hut - Hairlatte
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese, Korean
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants inspired by Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Each location is individual family operated. Serves all vegan food, non-alcoholic beverages, and vegan desserts. Last order 8pm. Note that sometimes closes earlier, so better call ahead if coming in the evening.
